A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gave it one star to get my review posted. Doesn't deserve it!  I'm pissed that Disney is trying to ruin a classic series! You made Yoda look like an idiot! You ruined Luke Skywalkers character!  I'm all about girl power but this was over the top! I'm sorry I paid money to see it and I won't be seeing the next installment!  Best to forget what I saw in TLJ and pretend it didn't happen!
